description.value:
Utility

  • Lock: Has an AC of 18, is immune to &reference[poison] and &reference[psychic] damage, resistant to non-adamantine physical, &reference[cold], &reference[lightning], &reference[fire], &reference[necrotic], and &reference[thunder] damage, and must take 10 damage at once to break.

A lock comes with a matching key. Without the key, a creature must attempt to break the lock or use a Sleight of Hand check with thieves' tools.


[[/skill slt 15]]{Sleight of Hand Check (DC 15)}

  • Success: The lock becomes unlocked.

  • Failure: No effect.
